name: Multi-Char
description:
Multi-Char Is A Game About 2 Characters That We Can Control Using WASD. They Are Joined Together. To Finish The Level They Have To Go To Through A Portal Together. So They Don`t Lose Control.

Sorry Sometimes Weird Things Happens To The Camera

Controls:

Press WASD To Move Around.

Press Space Bar To Jump.

Collide With Objects To Change The Distance Between Both Players
